Keywords: Armor , Latveria , Mystical , Past , Ruler , Scientist
Real Name: Victor Von Doom
Special Powers
REPULSOR REFLECT: FREE: Remove a d6 from this card. Giant Reach: X this turn, where X is the result of that d6.
THIS IS NO ORDINARY WEAPON, LACKEY. IT IS...EXCALIBUR!: Blades/Claws/Fangs, Super Senses. If there is no d6 on this card when Dr. Doom uses either power, after resolutions you may place the result of that d6 on this card. // When Dr. Doom uses Blades/Claws/Fangs or Super Senses, once per turn you may replace the die in the result for the d6 roll with the d6 on this card.
THE EXCALIBUR SHARD, FUSED WITH MY ARMOR!: Invincible. When Dr. Doom clears (at least 1 action token), you may remove the die on this card to heal him 1 click. Protected: Outwit.
Trade Dr. Doom Want Dr. Doom

September 23, 2022
logangodofcandy
Doom DOES have range. Take a crummy b/c/f or SS roll, every time, and you get to use it for a giant reach b/c/f attack. Hail to the king
February 17, 2022
odinson51303
Reminds me a little of Ulik… all he needs is the blood axe and doom it’s acting as rock trolls :)
February 17, 2022
odinson51303
Been out of the game for a couple of years now, and trying to get back into it. The last brick I bought was The Mighty Thor set. So as I’m coming back (because of the fantastic four) I’m seeing more pieces like this. 100pts for ALL of this?!?! I would have gone negative in my bank account to acquire this and more like it.. funny how evolved it has gotten in 2 years. Makes most of what I have irrelevant except during home games. I’m sure he’s mediocre compared to other recent pieces, but this is the first piece I’ve seen in 2 years and he has blown my mind.
January 4, 2022
Goop
12atk w/ invincible all the way down protected from outwit is pretty good for 100pts. The dice stuff is kinda interesting how it works. Basically if you get a good roll for bcf or ss you get to use that value again. If you get a low roll you will likely use it for giant reach or a 1 click heal. Kinda gimicky but interesting for a melee only Doom.
